tool_description: Cinemos API is an easy solution for films, songs or webseries related news database. It includes Bollywood, South-Indian and International films related news, including some of those you watch frequently.
name: Cinemos
title: Cinemos

api_list.name: Get South Indian Films News by Page
api_list.description: This endpoint will give South Indian Films related news by pages. Each page will have 12 articles each.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cinemos.p.rapidapi.com/news/south-cinema/page/9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cinemos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cinemos.p.rapidapi.com/news/south-cinema/page/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cinemos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
